column1: Smoque BBQ////Best BBQ I've ever eaten!  The Brisket was tender and lean
column2: the pulled pork melted in my mouth
column3: the Texas-style sauce was tangy and thin
column4: the best mac and cheese i've ever eaten as well (covered in buttery breadcrumbs).  There's a bit of a wait now that the place has appeared on several local and national television shows
column5: but its well worth it.  Very Decent prices for BBQ
column6: much less awesome BBQ.  The pulled pork and brisket were each $10 and included coleslaw and two other sides
column7: which amounted to a decent portion of food.
